com.atakmap.android.menu

Interface MapMenuEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BloodHoundLinkReceiver, CompassArrowMapComponent, FreeLookMapComponent

    public interface MapMenuEventListener
    Event interface for radial menu events

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onHideMenu(MapItem item)
      The radial menu is about to be closed
      boolean onShowMenu(MapItem item)
      The radial menu is about to be shown for an item

    • Method Detail

      • onShowMenu

        boolean onShowMenu(MapItem item)
        The radial menu is about to be shown for an item
        Parameters:
        item - Map item
        Returns:
        True if event handled (suppress default behavior)

        The radial menu is about to be closed
